data.title: Last marine heat wave providing lessons for the future
data.description: SAN FRANCISCO — They call it “the Blob". A decade ago, sea surface temperatures in the Pacific soared 11 degrees Celsius above normal.

data.title: UNHCR supports Thailand in making statelessness history
data.description: Building on the recent resolution by the Thai Cabinet to accelerate a pathway to nationality for nearly half a million stateless people, the Royal Thai Government (RTG) today reaffirmed its commitment to make statelessness in Thailand a thing of the past. At an event in Bangkok coordinated between the Royal Thai Government and UNHCR,    the UN Refugee Agency, senior Thai officials shared Thailand’s bold vision on how to empower close to half a million people who are currently stateless to become productive Thai nationals.

data.title: Finance Ministry seeks another THB50bn for flood relief in South
data.description: Money will fund soft loans and debt relief for thousands of households and businesses across five inundated provinces

data.title: C.P. Group Launches Corn Traceability System in Myanmar
data.description: C.P. Group, through its subsidiaries Charoen Pokphand Produce Co., Ltd. (CPP) and Bangkok Produce PLC (BKP), is taking bold steps to address environmental and supply chain challenges in Myanmar. Partnering with the Myanmar Corn Industrial Association (MCIA), the company has launched a state-of-the-art traceability system for the country’s corn supply chain, employing satellite imagery and blockchain technology.

data.title: Thais urged to donate blood to mark King Rama IX’s birthday
data.description: Public invited to give blood at donation centres nationwide throughout December in memory of beloved late king

data.title: The sisterhood's rise
data.description: In a year marked by highly anticipated releases, Dune: Prophecy made a unique entry into HBO

data.title: Jailed, corrupt former commerce minister released on parole
data.description: The Department of Corrections on Monday released on parole former commerce minister Boonsong Teriyapirom, who was earlier sentenced to 48 years in prison for corruption in government rice sales, according to an informed source.

data.title: Thai cross-border trade jumps 6.18%, boosted by fruit to China
data.description: Commerce Ministry announces trade worth 1.514 trillion baht in first 10 months of 2024, sets target of 2 trillion baht per year by 2030

data.title: Biden says he is pardoning his son, Hunter
data.description: WASHINGTON: US President Joe Biden said on Sunday he had pardoned his son, Hunter Biden.

data.title: Guest caught on camera stealing hotel's money
data.description: PATTAYA - A foreign guest was filmed stealing 4,000 baht from the untended front desk of an apartment hotel while checking out early on Sunday morning.

data.title: Credit card debt cuts will only apply to those on credit bureau list
data.description: National Economic and Social Development Council stresses that the proposed measures do not refer to regular credit card accounts

data.title: Hydrogen and nuclear power to drive transition to clean energy
data.description: EGAT, PTT, Bangchak and Mitsubishi Power outline their plans to help Thailand move away from polluting fossil fuels

data.title: Traceability from farm to table
data.description: How technological innovation is changing the world, promoting sustainable practices in the production and supply of food

data.title: Bangkok’s Identity Transformed at Future Lab 4
data.description: Siam Discovery – The Exploratorium, renowned as a hub for lifestyle experimentation, invites Bangkokians and visitors to reimagine the city’s identity through the groundbreaking project, Future Lab Volume 4: Design Culture. Running from 27 November 2024 to January 2025, the event takes place at two prominent venues: the Pathumwan Intersection Skywalk and the M Floor of Siam Discovery.

data.title: Rama II Road fix in 2 weeks
data.description: The outbound lanes on Rama II Road in Samut Sakhon will be re-opened to traffic within 14 days after work to clear the site of Friday

data.title: BONAVENTURA Brings Italian Elegance to CentralWorld
data.description: Explore timeless leather designs at BONAVENTURA’s first Thailand Pop-Up Store, open until 31 January 2025.

data.title: Thailand’s famed hot and sour soup to gain UNESCO recognition
data.description: Culture Ministry to celebrate the registration of tom yum kung and kebaya by UNESCO with a three-day event at EmQuartier

data.title: Sunny and cool for most of Thailand, scattered thunderstorms in South
data.description: Rain eases in Southern Thailand but more downpours to come later in the week, Thailand Meteorological Department warns

data.title: Bangchak Hosts 14th Greenovative Forum on AI and Sustainability
data.description: Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited, in collaboration with The Standard news agency, hosted the 14th Greenovative Forum under the theme “Crafting Tomorrow’s Future with Sustainable Energy and AI” at True Digital Park West. Marking Bangchak’s 40th anniversary, the event brought together over 600 attendees, including local and international experts, to discuss the pivotal role of artificial intelligence (AI) in advancing sustainable energy, societal progress, and environmental solutions.

data.title: Bhumjaithai backs sea dispute debate
data.description: The Bhumjaithai Party is supporting Pheu Thai list MP Noppadon Pattama

data.title: Institute hails progress in child heart procedures
data.description: About 4,000 babies are born with congenital heart disease each year, with 10% having severe heart disease needing urgent treatment, says the Department of Medical Services (DMS).

data.title: HIV forum urges more PrEP options
data.description: PrEP medication options for HIV prevention should be diversified to ensure people have more choices to meet their requirements, a recent forum as told.

data.title: Chaowalit Phalaphon, Thai Senior "Sogo" Champion, receives 240,000 baht
data.description: Chaowalit Phalaphon wins Thai Senior Tour, receives 240,000 baht prize money, last course in Phuket Province, Sunday, December 1, 2024

data.title: Philippines is still the ‘World’s Leading Dive Destination’ for 2024 – WTA
data.description: For the sixth consecutive year, the Philippines bagged the “World’s Leading Dive Destination” title from the prestigious World Travel Awards (WTA), Tourism Secretary Christina Garcia Frasco said on Thursday.

data.title: Thailand protests against Myanmar’s navy firing at Thai fishing boats
data.description: Thailand protested against an incident involving Myanmar’s navy firing on Thai fishing vessels, Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra said on Dec 1, after one fisherman drowned, two were injured and dozens were detained from one of the boats.

data.title: PH is still the ‘World’s Leading Dive Destination’ for 2024 – WTA.
data.description: ANILAO, Mabini, Batangas — For the sixth consecutive year, the Philippines bagged the “World’s Leading Dive Destination” title from the prestigious World Travel Awards (WTA), Tourism Secretary Christina Garcia Frasco said on Thursday.

data.title: Thailand protests against Myanmar’s navy firing at Thai fishing boats
data.description: Thailand protested against an incident involving Myanmar’s navy firing on Thai fishing vessels, Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra said on Dec 1, after one fisherman drowned, two were injured and dozens were detained from one of the boats.
